plugin.name: docking-frame
plugin.author: Hackergarten
plugin.title: Griffon docking frame add-on
plugin.description: \ The docking frame add-on for Griffon, alows the user to have movable panels, or other components, in a frame, the docking frame. The panels can be rearranged inside the frame, stacked on top of each other (i.e. creating a tabbed pane), or even moved to another docking frame in the application.
